content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where '{Machine}' == '*' or Computer contains '{Machine}'
| summarize AvgCPU=avg(ProcCPUPercent_d) by ProcName_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Process CPU Usage (Top Processes)

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where '{Machine}' == '*' or Computer contains '{Machine}'
| summarize AvgRAM=avg(ProcWorkingSetMB_d) by ProcName_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Process RAM Usage (MB)

content.query:
uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where '{Machine}' == '*' or Computer contains '{Machine}'
| summarize AvgIO=avg(ProcIOReadCount_d + ProcIOWriteCount_d) by ProcName_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render timechart
content.title: Process IO Count

content.query:
let detail = 
    uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
    | where '{Machine}' == '*' or Computer contains '{Machine}'
    | summarize 
        TotalCPUTime = round(avg(ProcCPUTimeMs_d / 1000.0), 2),
        CPUPercent = round(avg(ProcCPUPercent_d), 2),
        IOCount = round(avg(ProcIOReadCount_d + ProcIOWriteCount_d), 2),
        IOMB = round(avg(ProcIOReadMB_d + ProcIOWriteMB_d), 2),
        IOLatency = round(avg(ProcIOLatencyReadMs2_d + ProcIOLatencyWriteMs2_d), 2),
        RAMMB = round(avg(ProcWorkingSetMB_d), 2),
        NetKBPS = round(avg(ProcNetKBPS_d), 2),
        LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
    by ProcName_s, Computer;

let stats = 
    uberAgent_Process_ProcessStatistics_CL
    | where '{Machine}' == '*' or Computer contains '{Machine}'
    | summarize 
        PrivateMB = round(avg(ProcPrivateMB_d), 2),
        VirtualMB = round(avg(ProcVirtualSizeMB_d), 2),
        PageFaults = round(avg(ProcPageFaultsPS_d), 2),
        PageFileMB = round(avg(ProcPageFileMB_d), 2),
        ThreadCount = round(avg(ProcThreadCount_d), 2)
    by ProcName_s, Computer;

detail
| join kind=leftouter stats on ProcName_s, Computer
| project 
    Computer,
    ['Process Name'] = ProcName_s,
    ['Total CPU time (s)'] = TotalCPUTime,
    ['CPU (%)'] = CPUPercent,
    ['Total IO (count)'] = IOCount,
    ['Total IO (MB)'] = IOMB,
    ['Avg. IO latency (ms)'] = IOLatency,
    ['RAM (MB)'] = RAMMB,
    ['Net thruput (KB/s)'] = NetKBPS,
    ['Thread count'] = ThreadCount,
    ['RAM - Private (MB)'] = PrivateMB,
    ['RAM - Virtual (MB)'] = VirtualMB,
    ['Page faults (per s)'] = PageFaults,
    ['Page file (MB)'] = PageFileMB,
    ['Last Seen'] = LastSeen
| sort by ['CPU (%)'] desc
| take 100
content.title: Running Processes - Resource Overview
